sn4.14:1.1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling among the Kosalans at the brahmin village of Ekasālā.
sn4.14:1.2: Now on that occasion the Blessed One was teaching the Dhamma surrounded by a large assembly of laypeople.
sn4.14:2.1: Then it occurred to Māra the Evil One:
sn4.14:2.2: “This ascetic Gotama is teaching the Dhamma while surrounded by a large assembly of laypeople.
sn4.14:2.3: Let me approach the ascetic Gotama in order to confound them. ”
sn4.14:2.4: Then Māra the Evil One approached the Blessed One and addressed him in verse:
sn4.14:3.4: When so engaged don’t get caught.”
sn4.14:5.1: Then Māra the Evil One … disappeared right there.
